title: Land of magic
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Terry Ashwood and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: The scenic beauties, history, and holiday amenities of Northern Ireland. Ulster, the green land, is rich in unspoilt countryside; a sportman’s paradise with ample facilities for tennis and walking, golf an fishing. The unique pilgrimage to Country Down, the majestic castle at Derry, the Mountains of Mourne, and the markets and entertainments of Belfast are shown in the film.
